mapper.select: select * from posts where title regexp (#{query}) or content regexp(#{query}) order by updated_at limit 10
select * from cafe where cafe_name regexp (#{query}) or cafe_address regexp(#{query})

select c.* from cafe c join (select p.cafe_id from posts p join (select ph.posts_id from post_hashtag ph join (select * from hashtag h where h.name regexp (#{query})) as hh on ph.hashtag_id = hh.hashtag_id) as phs on p.id=phs.posts_id) as pp on c.cafe_id = pp.cafe_id
